text: "Feels Like the First Time" is a 1977 debut song by British American band Foreigner and taken from their debut studio album Foreigner. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 7 in Canada, number 39 in the United Kingdom and number 41 in Australia. Category:Rock songs Category:1977 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Foreigner (band) songs
title: Feels Like the First Time
